name: The Elevator Pitch - by Scavo Davide
name_original: The Elevator Pitch - by Scavo Davide
description:
This is a "game Alpha" but I hope you and blackthornprod can appraise the concept and the potentiality of this project. Comment with your feedback.

The Elevator Pitch: 

- "You have to decide if produce the game( ✔) or refuse it (x)" 

- "Buy items in the shop for costumize your character and upgrade it for earn more   money!"

- "Higher level = Better Pitch (and more money)"

- "Click the flying gift for receive money!"

Details:

- In the download (.zip) you will find 2 file, download all for play.
